name: 测试1
note_text:
→我相信骑士团。
→但这不代表我会信任他们，即使就短暂的接触来看，不管是歌洛莉亚还是泰登，都是值得信赖的正直骑士，但他们终究是外国势力。
→他们远道而来绝对是有所图谋，我不能相信他们。如果拉维耶在的话，一定也会抱有同样的怀疑。
→基于生存的压力，我们需要一个强大的盟友，我们会紧密的合作一段时间——比如他们正准备修筑一个据点，我们可以帮上忙以换取暂时的骑士团庇护。
→<#0000FF>但我也要留好后手，毕竟他们不远万里坐船来伊利亚，绝对不是为了做好人好事的。

name: 测试2
text: 他们远道而来可不是搞慈善的
note_text:
→我不相信骑士团。
→但这不代表我会信任他们，即使就短暂的接触来看，不管是歌洛莉亚还是泰登，都是值得信赖的正直骑士，但他们终究是外国势力。
→他们远道而来绝对是有所图谋，我不能相信他们。如果拉维耶在的话，一定也会抱有同样的怀疑。
→基于生存的压力，我们需要一个强大的盟友，我们会紧密的合作一段时间——比如他们正准备修筑一个据点，我们可以帮上忙以换取暂时的骑士团庇护。
→但我也要留好后手，毕竟他们不远万里坐船来伊利亚，绝对不是为了做好人好事的。

name: 测试3
note_text: 相信原因1。→我们1一直都有所怀疑骑士团在筹划些什么见不派遣的事情，现在是时候进一步展开调查了，掌握骑士团的肮脏秘密对我们一定会有很大的帮助……不论我们是否依然继续帮助他们。我们1一直都有所怀疑骑士团在筹划些什么见不派遣的事情，现在是时候进一步展开调查了，掌握骑士团的肮脏秘密对我们一定会有很大的帮助……不论我们是否依然继续帮助他们。

name: 测试4
note_text: 相信原因2。

name: 测试5
note_text: 不相信原因1。→我们1一直都有所怀疑骑士团在筹划些什么见不派遣的事情，现在是时候进一步展开调查了，掌握骑士团的肮脏秘密对我们一定会有很大的帮助……不论我们是否依然继续帮助他们。

name: 测试6
note_text: 不相信原因2。

name: zhm测试选项1-A
note_text: 这是选A之后的笔记文本。这是选A之后的笔记文本。这是选A之后的笔记文本。这是选A之后的笔记文本。这是选A之后的笔记文本。

name: zhm测试选项1-B
note_text: 这是选B之后的笔记文本。这是选B之后的笔记文本。这是选B之后的笔记文本。这是选B之后的笔记文本。这是选B之后的笔记文本。

name: QV3-P3-参与十字路口要塞攻城战前-选择1-选项1
text: Choosing a side to align with early on is most sensible.
note_text:
The earlier we choose a certain faction in the war, the more beneficial it will be for us. 
Compared to the Empire and King's Army; the strength of the Union is clear for all to see. Their conviction and will to fight are also very strong.

name: QV3-P3-参与十字路口要塞攻城战前-选择1-选项2
text: Cooperating with the Union is just temporary.
note_text:
Forming an alliance with the Union is only a temporary solution. 
We must be responsible for ourselves and the town. 
And anyways, Lutfi seems to have the same idea.

name: QV3-P4-十字路口会战后的反思（无信物）-选择1-选项1
note_text:
He has always been working to help the Town of Convallaria and the Mercenary Group.
He provided us with grain, profitable orders, and reconciled our relationship with the Union. 
He's certainly not a pushover, but he is friendly and sincere to us.

name: QV3-P4-十字路口会战后的反思（无信物）-选择1-选项2
text: He must be up to something.
note_text:
Being a prince, of course he's not a pushover. 
He might have ulterior motives for wanting to win over the Sword of Convallaria… Should we believe him? 
Or should we get closer to Paladin Gloria?

name: QV3-P4-十字路口会战后的反思（歌洛莉亚信物）-选择1-选项1
note_text:
She is a good and righteous person. 
She didn't hesitate to turn back to try and save us and fought until the end. 
I believe she is a noble person who truly wants to fight for peace.

name: QV3-P4-十字路口会战后的反思（歌洛莉亚信物）-选择1-选项2
note_text:
I'm very grateful to her for saving us, and I also admire her personality and character. 
But I'm afraid she will sacrifice the town for an equally valid but naive reason. 
I would never do anything to harm her, but if we want to end the war… 
Perhaps Lutfi is more pragmatic.

name: QV3-P4-关于二王子的计划-选择1-选项1
text: Lutfi may not be pursuing the truth.
note_text:
Lutfi cooperation with the Order isn't sincere… 
He seems to be using their power only to dispose of them later. 
I'm not sure how, but the key to this may be in the Waverun City incident. 
In other words… he may not actually be in search of the truth behind the incident…

name: QV3-P4-关于二王子的计划-选择1-选项2
text: Lutfi's plan may bring the dawn of peace.
note_text:
Lutfi cooperation with the Order isn't sincere… 
He seems to be using their power only to dispose of them later. 
If he can manage it, then there's little doubt that peace will be ushered in after. 
I think we can trust him, and the Sword of Convallaria will cooperate with him. 
For both Iria's sake and our own.

name: QV3-P5-二王子的来信-选择1-选项1
note_text:
Nothing is more important than the truth. If anyone's most likely to discover the truth, it would be Gloria. 
I should help her.

name: QV3-P5-二王子的来信-选择1-选项2
note_text:
Lutfi is right. Irians should be the ones to bring peace to Iria. He is more capable of ending this war than a naive knight. 
I will do as he says.

name: zhm测试选项1-A-A
note_text: zhm测试选项1-A-A的笔记文本。

name: zhm测试选项1-A-B
note_text: zhm测试选项1-A-B的笔记文本。

name: zhm测试选项1-B-A
note_text: zhm测试选项1-B-A的笔记文本。

name: zhm测试选项1-B-B
note_text: zhm测试选项1-B-B的笔记文本。

name: 和谈失败后的笔记-抉择1-选择1
text: The Papal States' intentions were good, but their actions are too radical.
note_text:
The Papal States wanted to achieve peace quickly, and thus their actions were too radical. The trust between the two countries needs time to rebuild, or at least both sides should have the intention to negotiate peace.
Although the goal that Samantha and I were pursuing cannot be achieved immediately, there is no single path to peace. There are still opportunities and time.

name: 和谈失败后的笔记-抉择1-选择2
text: The Papal States' actions are unreasonable.
note_text:
The Papal States has no intention of resolving things peacefully. There was no effort to accommodate the needs of Irians in the negotiations. All this will do is widen the rift between the two nations and make peace even less likely. 
Samantha is suffering as a result. Instead of peace, war now looms over the horizon. We must do something, but for now, the direction we need to move in is unclear.
